LatestNews.Content: Browns placed RB Dion Lewis on injured reserve with a fractured left fibula, ending his season.

LatestNews.Title: Browns confirm RB Dion Lewis' season is over

LatestNews.Content: Browns acquired RB Dion Lewis from the Eagles in exchange for LB Emmanuel Acho.

LatestNews.Title: Report: Eagles RB Lewis on trade block again

LatestNews.Content: Eagles RB Dion Lewis was arrested early Saturday and charged with a felony count of falsely reporting a fire and misdemeanor reckless endangerment.
